morning_azkar.label: Morning Azkar
morning_azkar.description: Start your day with remembrance of Allah

evening_azkar.label: Evening Azkar
evening_azkar.description: End your day with remembrance of Allah

morning_ayat_kursi.translation: Allah - there is no deity except Him, the Ever-Living, the Self-Sustaining. Neither drowsiness overtakes Him nor sleep. To Him belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth. Who is it that can intercede with Him except by His permission? He knows what is before them and what will be after them, and they encompass not a thing of His knowledge except for what He wills. His Kursi extends over the heavens and the earth, and their preservation tires Him not. And He is the Most High, the Most Great.

morning_ikhlas.translation: Say: He is Allah, the One. Allah, the Eternal Refuge. He neither begets nor is born. Nor is there to Him any equivalent.

morning_falaq.translation: Say: I seek refuge in the Lord of daybreak. From the evil of that which He created. And from the evil of darkness when it settles. And from the evil of the blowers in knots. And from the evil of an envier when he envies.

morning_nas.translation: Say: I seek refuge in the Lord of mankind. The Sovereign of mankind. The God of mankind. From the evil of the retreating whisperer. Who whispers in the breasts of mankind. From among the jinn and mankind.

morning_asbahna.translation: We have entered a new morning and with it all dominion belongs to Allah. Praise is to Allah. None has the right to be worshipped but Allah alone, with no partner. To Him belongs the dominion, to Him praise is due, and He has power over all things.

morning_sayyid_istighfar.translation: O Allah, You are my Lord, there is no god but You. You created me and I am Your servant. I abide by Your covenant and promise as best I can. I seek refuge in You from the evil I have done. I acknowledge Your favor upon me, and I acknowledge my sin, so forgive me, for none forgives sins but You.
morning_sayyid_istighfar.virtue: Whoever says this during the day with firm belief and dies on that day before evening, he will be among the people of Paradise.

morning_allahumma_inni.translation: O Allah, I have entered a new morning and I call upon You, the bearers of Your Throne, Your angels, and all of Your creation to witness that You are Allah, none has the right to be worshipped but You, alone, without partner, and that Muhammad is Your servant and Messenger.

morning_allahumma_aafini.translation: O Allah, grant me health in my body. O Allah, grant me health in my hearing. O Allah, grant me health in my sight. There is no god but You.

morning_subhanallah_wabihamdihi.translation: Glory be to Allah and His is the praise.
morning_subhanallah_wabihamdihi.virtue: Whoever says this 100 times in the morning, his sins will be forgiven even if they are like the foam of the sea.

morning_la_ilaha_illallah.translation: None has the right to be worshipped but Allah alone, with no partner. To Him belongs the dominion, to Him praise is due, and He has power over all things.
morning_la_ilaha_illallah.virtue: Whoever says this 10 times will have the reward of freeing 4 slaves from the children of Isma'il.

morning_bismillah.translation: In the Name of Allah, with Whose Name nothing on earth or in heaven can cause harm, and He is the All-Hearing, the All-Knowing.
morning_bismillah.virtue: Nothing will harm the one who says this three times in the morning and evening.

morning_raditu.translation: I am pleased with Allah as Lord, with Islam as religion, and with Muhammad (peace be upon him) as Prophet.

morning_subhanallah_wabihamdihi_azeem.translation: Glory be to Allah and His is the praise, as many times as the number of His creatures, in accordance with His Good Pleasure, equal to the weight of His Throne and equal to the ink that may be used in recording the words for His Praises.

morning_allahumma_inni_asaluka_ilm.translation: O Allah, I ask You for beneficial knowledge, good provision, and accepted deeds.

morning_astaghfirullah.translation: I seek forgiveness from Allah and repent to Him.

morning_ma_asbaha.translation: O Allah, whatever blessing has been received by me or anyone of Your creation is from You alone, without partner, so for You is all praise and unto You all thanks.

morning_hasbiyallah.translation: Allah is sufficient for me; there is no god but He. On Him I put my trust, and He is the Lord of the Mighty Throne.

morning_ya_hayyu.translation: O Ever Living, O Self-Subsisting, by Your mercy I seek help. Rectify for me all of my affairs, and do not leave me to myself for the blink of an eye.

morning_fitrah.translation: We rise upon the fitrah of Islam, upon the word of sincere devotion, upon the religion of our Prophet Muhammad (peace be upon him), and upon the way of our father Ibrahim, who was upright and Muslim, and was not of the polytheists.

morning_asaluka_afwa.translation: O Allah, I ask You for pardon and well-being in this life and the Hereafter. O Allah, I ask You for pardon and well-being in my religious and worldly affairs, and my family and my wealth. O Allah, veil my weaknesses and set at ease my dismay. O Allah, preserve me from the front and from behind, from my right and from my left, and from above, and I take refuge with You from being unexpectedly destroyed from beneath me.

morning_alim_ghayb.translation: O Allah, Knower of the unseen and the seen, Creator of the heavens and the earth, Lord and Sovereign of everything, I bear witness that there is no god but You. I seek refuge in You from the evil of my soul and from the evil of Satan and his associates, and from committing wrong against my soul or bringing it upon a Muslim.

morning_audhu_kufr.translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from disbelief and poverty, and I seek refuge in You from the punishment of the grave. There is no god but You.

morning_bika_asbahna.translation: O Allah, by You we enter the morning, by You we enter the evening, by You we live, by You we die, and to You is the resurrection.

evening_ayat_kursi.translation: Allah - there is no deity except Him, the Ever-Living, the Self-Sustaining. Neither drowsiness overtakes Him nor sleep. To Him belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth.

evening_ikhlas.translation: Say: He is Allah, the One. Allah, the Eternal Refuge. He neither begets nor is born. Nor is there to Him any equivalent.

evening_falaq.translation: Say: I seek refuge in the Lord of daybreak. From the evil of that which He created.

evening_nas.translation: Say: I seek refuge in the Lord of mankind. The Sovereign of mankind. The God of mankind.

evening_amsayna.translation: We have entered a new evening and with it all dominion belongs to Allah. Praise is to Allah. None has the right to be worshipped but Allah alone, with no partner.

evening_allahumma_inni.translation: O Allah, I have entered a new evening and I call upon You, the bearers of Your Throne, Your angels, and all of Your creation to witness that You are Allah, none has the right to be worshipped but You.

evening_allahumma_aafini.translation: O Allah, grant me health in my body. O Allah, grant me health in my hearing. O Allah, grant me health in my sight. There is no god but You.

evening_subhanallah_wabihamdihi.translation: Glory be to Allah and His is the praise.

evening_la_ilaha_illallah.translation: None has the right to be worshipped but Allah alone, with no partner. To Him belongs the dominion, to Him praise is due, and He has power over all things.

evening_bismillah.translation: In the Name of Allah, with Whose Name nothing on earth or in heaven can cause harm, and He is the All-Hearing, the All-Knowing.

evening_raditu.translation: I am pleased with Allah as Lord, with Islam as religion, and with Muhammad (peace be upon him) as Prophet.

evening_a3udhu_kalimat.translation: I seek refuge in the perfect words of Allah from the evil of what He has created.

evening_allahumma_bika_amsayna.translation: O Allah, by You we enter the evening and by You we enter the morning, by You we live and by You we die, and to You is the return.

evening_ma_amsa.translation: O Allah, whatever blessing has been received by me or anyone of Your creation is from You alone, without partner, so for You is all praise and unto You all thanks.

evening_hasbiyallah.translation: Allah is sufficient for me; there is no god but He. On Him I put my trust, and He is the Lord of the Mighty Throne.

evening_ya_hayyu.translation: O Ever Living, O Self-Subsisting, by Your mercy I seek help. Rectify for me all of my affairs, and do not leave me to myself for the blink of an eye.

evening_fitrah.translation: We have entered the evening upon the fitrah of Islam, upon the word of sincere devotion, upon the religion of our Prophet Muhammad (peace be upon him), and upon the way of our father Ibrahim, who was upright and Muslim, and was not of the polytheists.

evening_asaluka_afwa.translation: O Allah, I ask You for pardon and well-being in this life and the Hereafter. O Allah, I ask You for pardon and well-being in my religious and worldly affairs, and my family and my wealth. O Allah, veil my weaknesses and set at ease my dismay. O Allah, preserve me from the front and from behind, from my right and from my left, and from above, and I take refuge with You from being unexpectedly destroyed from beneath me.

evening_alim_ghayb.translation: O Allah, Knower of the unseen and the seen, Creator of the heavens and the earth, Lord and Sovereign of everything, I bear witness that there is no god but You. I seek refuge in You from the evil of my soul and from the evil of Satan and his associates, and from committing wrong against my soul or bringing it upon a Muslim.

evening_audhu_kufr.translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from disbelief and poverty, and I seek refuge in You from the punishment of the grave. There is no god but You.

evening_sayyid_istighfar.translation: O Allah, You are my Lord, there is no god but You. You created me and I am Your servant. I abide by Your covenant and promise as best I can. I seek refuge in You from the evil I have done. I acknowledge Your favor upon me, and I acknowledge my sin, so forgive me, for none forgives sins but You.
evening_sayyid_istighfar.virtue: Whoever says this during the evening with firm belief and dies on that night before morning, he will be among the people of Paradise.

evening_subhanallah_wabihamdihi_azeem.translation: Glory be to Allah and His is the praise, as many times as the number of His creatures, in accordance with His Good Pleasure, equal to the weight of His Throne and equal to the ink that may be used in recording the words for His Praises.

evening_astaghfirullah.translation: I seek forgiveness from Allah and repent to Him.

sleep_ayat_kursi.translation: Allah - there is no deity except Him, the Ever-Living, the Self-Sustaining.

sleep_ikhlas.translation: Say: He is Allah, the One.

sleep_falaq.translation: Say: I seek refuge in the Lord of daybreak.

sleep_nas.translation: Say: I seek refuge in the Lord of mankind.

sleep_bismika.translation: In Your name, O Allah, I die and I live.

sleep_allahumma_qini.translation: O Allah, protect me from Your punishment on the day You resurrect Your servants.

sleep_alhamdulillah_33.translation: All praise is due to Allah.

prayer_allahumma_antas_salam.translation: O Allah, You are Peace and from You is peace. Blessed are You, O Possessor of Majesty and Honor.

prayer_alhamdulillah.translation: All praise is due to Allah.

prayer_ayat_kursi.translation: Allah - there is no deity except Him, the Ever-Living, the Self-Sustaining.
prayer_ayat_kursi.virtue: Whoever recites Ayat al-Kursi after every obligatory prayer, nothing prevents him from entering Paradise except death.

prayer_la_ilaha_illallah.translation: None has the right to be worshipped but Allah alone, with no partner. To Him belongs the dominion, to Him praise is due, and He has power over all things.

waking_alhamdulillah.translation: All praise is to Allah Who gave us life after causing us to die, and unto Him is the resurrection.

waking_la_ilaha_illallah.translation: None has the right to be worshipped but Allah alone, with no partner. To Him belongs the dominion, to Him praise is due, and He has power over all things. Glory be to Allah. Praise be to Allah. There is no god but Allah. Allah is the Greatest. There is no power and no strength except with Allah, the Most High, the Most Great.
waking_la_ilaha_illallah.virtue: Whoever says this upon waking and then makes a supplication will be answered.

waking_allahumma_inni_asaluka.translation: O Allah, I ask You for the goodness of this day: its opening, victory, light, blessing, and guidance.

general_rabbana_atina.translation: Our Lord, give us in this world that which is good and in the Hereafter that which is good, and protect us from the punishment of the Fire.

general_rabbana_la_tuzigh.translation: Our Lord, let not our hearts deviate after You have guided us and grant us from Yourself mercy. Indeed, You are the Bestower.

general_rabbi_zidni.translation: My Lord, increase me in knowledge.

general_rabbana_taqabbal.translation: Our Lord, accept this from us. Indeed, You are the Hearing, the Knowing.

general_rabbi_habli.translation: My Lord, grant me from Yourself a good offspring. Indeed, You are the Hearer of supplication.

general_rabbana_afrigh.translation: Our Lord, pour upon us patience and plant firmly our feet and give us victory over the disbelieving people.

general_allahumma_inni_audhu_hamm.translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from worry and grief, from incapacity and laziness, from cowardice and miserliness, from being heavily in debt and from being overpowered by men.

general_allahumma_inni_asaluka_aafia.translation: O Allah, I ask You for well-being in this world and the next.

general_rabbi_innee_lima.translation: My Lord, indeed I am, for whatever good You would send down to me, in need.

general_hasbunallah.translation: Allah is sufficient for us, and He is the best disposer of affairs.

general_allahumma_musarrifal_qulub.translation: O Turner of the hearts, make my heart firm upon Your religion.

general_rabbana_zalamna.translation: Our Lord, we have wronged ourselves, and if You do not forgive us and have mercy upon us, we will surely be among the losers.

travel_subhanalladhi.translation: Glory to Him who has subjected this to us, and we could never have it by our efforts. And to our Lord we shall return.

travel_allahumma_hawwin.translation: O Allah, make this journey easy for us, and fold up the distance for us.

travel_allahumma_inni_asaluka.translation: O Allah, I ask You in this journey for righteousness and piety, and for deeds that are pleasing to You.

travel_returning.translation: We are returning, repenting, worshipping, and praising our Lord.

travel_entering_town.translation: O Allah, Lord of the seven heavens and all they shade, Lord of the seven earths and all they carry, Lord of the devils and all they mislead, Lord of the winds and all they scatter. I ask You for the good of this town and the good of its people and the good it contains. I seek refuge in You from its evil and the evil of its people and the evil it contains.

mosque_entering.translation: O Allah, open for me the gates of Your mercy.

mosque_leaving.translation: O Allah, I ask You of Your bounty.

mosque_between_adhan_iqama.translation: The supplication between the adhan and iqamah is not rejected.

mosque_after_adhan.translation: O Allah, Lord of this perfect call and the established prayer, grant Muhammad the intercession and virtue, and raise him to the praised station that You have promised him.
mosque_after_adhan.virtue: Whoever says this after hearing the adhan, my intercession will be granted to him on the Day of Judgment.

food_forgetting_bismillah.translation: In the Name of Allah, in its beginning and its end.

food_after_eating.translation: All praise is to Allah Who has fed me this and provided it for me without any strength or power on my part.
food_after_eating.virtue: Whoever says this after eating, his past sins will be forgiven.

food_guest_dua.translation: O Allah, bless them in what You have provided for them, forgive them, and have mercy on them.

misc_entering_home.translation: In the Name of Allah we enter, in the Name of Allah we leave, and upon our Lord we place our trust.

misc_leaving_home.translation: In the Name of Allah, I place my trust in Allah, and there is no might nor power except with Allah.
misc_leaving_home.virtue: It will be said to him: You are guided, defended and protected. The devil will turn away from him.

misc_entering_bathroom.translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from evil and evil ones.

misc_rain.translation: O Allah, let it be a beneficial rain.

misc_thunder.translation: Glory be to Him Whom the thunder glorifies with His praise, and the angels from awe of Him.

misc_istikhara.translation: O Allah, I seek Your guidance by virtue of Your knowledge, and I seek ability by virtue of Your power, and I ask You of Your great bounty. You have power and I do not. You know and I do not, and You are the Knower of the unseen.

misc_distress.translation: There is no god but Allah, the Great, the Forbearing. There is no god but Allah, Lord of the Magnificent Throne. There is no god but Allah, Lord of the heavens and Lord of the earth and Lord of the Noble Throne.
